caption.title: Correlation coefficients between CIM rainfall and (a) large scale climate indicators (ENSO – Purple, land-ocean thermal gradient: LETG-SA - green) and (b) regional scale indicators (IOD – Purple and land-ocean thermal gradient (LETG-IND, green) for CMIP3 (top panels) and CMIP5 (bottom panels); the corresponding observed correlation coefficients from multiple observations for the period (1951–2005) are shown in the middle panel.
caption.p: The symbol• indicates significant (P < 0.2) negative trend, while * indicates simulations that reproduce current mean annual and seasonal rainfall in the acceptable uncertainty band.
